          <title>
            <string language="hu">Hétfokúság hangközei</string>
            <string language="en">Intervals of heptatonics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abstände von heptatonics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Intervalles de heptatonics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Intervalos do heptatonics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Intervalli del heptatonics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαστήματα του heptatonics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Intervalos del heptatonics</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">diatonikus hangrendszer</string>
            <string language="en">Diatonic tonal system</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">prim,  prím,  szekund,  terc,  kvart,  kvárt,  kvint,  szext,  szeptim,  oktáv,  kis,  nagy,  tiszta,  </string>
            <string language="en">prime, prime, second, third, quart, forth, quint, sixth, septime, octave, minor, major, pure</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diatonisches tonal System</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Système tonal diatonique</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sistema diatonic do tonal</string>
          </description>
          <description>

          </description>
          <description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sistema diatonic del tonal</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Haupt, höchste Vollkommenheit, zweite, dritte, Quart 
weiter Quinte, 6., septime, Oktave, Untersatz, Major, rein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">principal, perfection, en second lieu, troisième, 
quart, en avant, quinte, sixième, septime, octave, mineur, 
commandant, pur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">principal, prima, segundo, terceiro, quarto, adiante, 
quint, sexto, septime, octave, menor, major, puro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">principale, perfezione, seconda, terza, quarto, avanti,
quint, sesto, septime, ottava, minore, maggiore, puro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πρωταρχικός, πρωταρχικός, δεύτερος, τρίτος, τέταρτο 
γαλλονιού, εμπρός, πεντάδα, έκτος, septime, οκτάβα, ανήλικος,
σημαντικός, καθαρός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">primero, prima, segunda, tercera, cuarto de galón, 
adelante, quint, sexto, septime, octava, menor de edad, comandante, 
puro</string>
          </keyword>
